title: Stuck on 100% in Loading Screen
body: so I stopped playing for about 3 months and when I came back nearly every third or second game I play is remade because I get stuck at 100% on everyone but the game still goes on, I've seen a lot of people talking about this on forums but haven't found one that has a response from Riot, and some people say to wrangle around with my PC settings and use command prompt but I'm sorry, i refuse to fuck around with my computer purely because Riot can't optimise a game, and not to mention despite these posts getting sizeable upvotes There hasn't been any warning or notice to address this, to me it looks like Riot is just sweeping this kind of stuff under the rug, and that's just poor form as a game company, they should try to ensure players get the best possible experience and notify them if anything could adversely affect them.

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

Run through the [**Connection Issues Troubleshooting**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
